author: karlgandhi360
title: Cardano Discord Integration
description: De nombreux projets sur Cardano ont des serveurs discord pour leur communauté, mais il n'y a pas de bots discord pour faciliter l'interaction avec Cardano.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal has the merit to be able to meet the expectations of the fund challenge as a low hanging fruit item within the Cardano ecosystem.  More details about how this proposal will scale and what it will include are limited.
f6_assessments.q1: Unfortunately, it appears that this proposal has been orphaned and the proposer had intended to add more details to the proposal but has failed to do that prior to the start of the assessment period.  With that said, almost nothing is written about what is planned to be done and how they would accomplish it, leaving very little support for proposal feasability.
f6_assessments.q2: As mentioned in the Implementation box, little information is left in what will be done and how it will be accomplished, meaning that there are no auditing metrics for this project.

f6_assessments.q0: There could be potential with this proposal, developing bots to integrate Cardano with discord, but at this stage, the proposal is more of a draft and it is hard to assess the impact it would have on the ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: There aren't any links included that would attest the team's experience, filled only in the mandatory field. The plan is not detailed, it is described as "TO COME", but there haven't been any changes made after that.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal is unfortunately in a draft stage, making it impossible to evaluate. I suggest resubmission in a future fund.

f6_assessments.q0: The problem and solution are not well detailed. The proposal lacks further explanation.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal is not well described, it seems that it should be filtered. Or that the filter has failed.
f6_assessments.q2: No description and details were given. There's no way to audit the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The project has the scope to open up better community interaction based on Discord authentication bound to staking or Discord authentication while holding NFT. This will be a powerful utility if implemented.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has claimed sufficient experience, which enables him. However, the lack of a plan gives an impression that the proposer has not followed up with this work.
f6_assessments.q2: The poject is likely to be technically simple but has the potential to provide value to the ecosystem. The details for auditing are lacking to audit the project. The proposer has come up with a good idea and if he has presented a workable plan this would have been a auditable project.

f6_assessments.q0: As a small discord bots app to make interaction with Cardano easier
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal is realistic but does not show the real usefulness of a bot application, and has not detailed a roadmap.
f6_assessments.q2: Discord bots activities are underground activities and it is difficult to test bots' performance in supporting interaction.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer focuses on proposing discord bots to make interaction with Cardano easier. The problem statement is not likely to describe the problem and is not explained in detail [instead of that, it is describing a need]. It seems that this proposal is incomplete because the solution is very abstract but worth trying for completing in the following fund. Based on the given information, I disagree with this proposal's impact, and would give it a score of 2.
f6_assessments.q1:
This proposer's profile is not provided, and, there is no proof/link for verification. Therefore, definitely, I can not agree on the feasibility of this proposal.
Based on the given information, I disagree with this proposal's feasible, and would give it a score of 2.
f6_assessments.q2: For an incomplete proposal like this, auditability can't be guaranteed. Therefore, my only advice would be: the proposer needs to ensure that the following components are fully met: (i) Goals and target; (2) road map (integrated with measurable KPIs/metrics); (3) Budget breakdown; (4) Risk and challenge. Based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's auditability, and would give it a score of 1.

solution: Le robot proposé aurait de nombreuses fonctionnalités différentes, notamment la vérification de la présence d'un utilisateur dans une réserve ou du montant de la réserve.
experience:
Travail dans l'équipe d'ingénierie d'un Cardano DEX bien connu.
Formation universitaire formelle en mathématiques et en informatique.
Expérience des applications Web.
